posts.message:
Guys, i started a young project 3 years ago that grew to be very popular now with couple million subscribers.
Its a restful api backend and has client webapp and mocbile app.

Question is what is the required documents/ restructure that i should do to the project in case i want to sell it to a big company ?

Is there any professionals who can help managing such projexts ? -7ad beyeshta3'al ma3 startups we ye7'alehom gahzen enohom yekbaro ?-

Elves is excited to offer a FULL scholarship for a female candidate that gets accepted to AlMakinah, an intense 12 week bootcamp that produces entry level, full stack developers. AlMakinah graduates are basically guaranteed great jobs in one of the most sought after fields and can boast being taught and mentored by Egyptâ€™s greatest tech minds.

Weâ€™d already signed up to hire at least one person per batch (thatâ€™s how much we believe in them) but we felt it was important to try and support this awesome initiative even further.

No excuses now! If youâ€™ve been thinking about learning how to code and getting into tech this is your chance - IT IS NOT TOO LATE! If you are an awesome, dedicated, smart, female candidate and want to build cool things like Elves we will proudly support you! ğŸ’ª
